attributes.action: Re-introduce Mortgage Interest Relief at Source (MIRAS)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Re-introducing Mortgage Interest Relief at Source would reduce home repossessions,help people stay in their homes,help first time buyers and support struggling homeowners generally.
The disposable income this would release would help support demand for goods and services across many sectors and lesson the depth of any recession.
